channel.title: Code on Jarrvski
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Jarrvski

item.title: Docker
item.description: My deep desire to throw myself against brick walls has reared it’s ugly head once more. An Open Source project I work on has recently taken on another member from the community I work in. This meant no more simple FTP’ing over into our dev server. Now we needed shards. For each developer… Otherwise we would start to cross streams as we worked on different parts of the project.

item.title: The correct way to write fizz-buzz
item.description:
Often during downtime, I find myself wondering to youtube to pass the time. Earlier today that lead me to Tom Scott’s new video on the usage of fizz-buzz as a programmer interview question:
During the video, Tom discussed about how programmers write their solution in a multitude of different ways. I thought it would be interesting to try my own hand at it, and see what I came up with…
